title: IHCL looks to strengthen leadership position in spiritual tourism, to add more hotels
description: Indian Hotels Company Ltd, led by Puneet Chhatwal, is expanding its presence in spiritual tourism by developing properties in noted locations in India. They have 66 hotels in spiritual destinations and are pleased with the financial performance of these properties.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
